A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A lot of people complaining about the last jedi. I liked it. Is it an old school star wars movie? No. Is that a bad thing. Nope\, not at all. I much prefer a different story than the same old same old. Does it have plot holes? Yep\, it definitely does. And yes there is a whole part that seems like a big waste of time. But I see a value in the waste of time. There is a point to this movie. A small person (trying to avoid spoilers here) says a line that sums up the movie. When you take that line into account the whole thing makes sense. Knowing what I know now I am looking forward to watching it again alone so that I can really absorb the little details that I missed and appreciate the theme of the story.
